name: Cemu
description: Includes Cemuhook plugin, graphic packs, and controller support
notes: Some options under the Debug menu cause the program to crash. Updating games via xml causes Cemu to crash. Use this method instead: - Open up: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/cemu_1.15.14/mlc01/usr/title and create a folder as well as an additional subfolder inside the newly created one. Name them after the game's Title ID. Now you're ready to extract your update folders: - For updates: mlc01/usr/title/00050000/101C9500 - For DLC: mlc01/usr/title/00050000/101C9500/aoc To obtain your game's Title ID launch your game and open your drive_c/Program Files (x86)/cemu_1.15.14/log.txt file. Search for the file path similar to the given example. Choose the Xbox_Controller profile in Cemu's input settings to enable controller support.
content:
files:
- cemu: http://cemu.info/releases/cemu_1.15.15.zip
- fonts: https://github.com/dnmodder/cemu_lutris_files/raw/master/sharedFonts.tar.gz
- hook: https://files.sshnuke.net/cemuhook_1159_0573.zip
- config: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dnmodder/cemu_lutris_files/master/cemuhook.ini
- packs: https://github.com/slashiee/cemu_graphic_packs/releases/download/Github540/graphicPacks540.zip
- controller: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AccountOneOff/lutris_files/master/Xbox_Controller.txt
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/cemu_1.15.15/Cemu.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: xact faudio vcrun2017 win7
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/cemu_1.15.15
    file: cemu
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/sharedFonts
    file: fonts
    format: tgz
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/cemu_1.15.15
    src: $CACHE/sharedFonts
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/hook
    file: hook
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/cemu_1.15.15
    src: $CACHE/hook
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/cemu_1.15.15/graphicPacks/downloadedGraphicPacks
    file: packs
- write_file:
    content: bleh
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/cemu_1.15.15/controllerProfiles/Xbox_Controller.txt
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/cemu_1.15.15/controllerProfiles
    src: controller
- write_file:
    content: bleh
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/cemu_1.15.15/cemuhook.ini
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/cemu_1.15.15/cemuhook.ini
    src: config
system:
  disable_compositor: true
  env:
    R600_DEBUG: nohyperz
    __GL_THREADED_OPTIMIZATIONS: 1
    mesa_glthread: true
    vblank_mode: 0
wine:
  esync: true
  overrides:
    dbghelp: native,builtin
    mscoree: disabled
    mshtml: disabled
  version: lutris-4.16-x86_64
